<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">

        <caller_access/>

        <description/>
        <name>AssetManagementPerRecordBaseJob</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AssetManagementPerRecordBaseJob = Class.create();
AssetManagementPerRecordBaseJob.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AssetManagementBaseJob, {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	/*
	Abstract function. Needs to be implemented in children classes if job type is 'Per Record'.
	*/
	getRecords: function() {
		throw this.type + ': getRecords() needs to be implemented';
	},
	
	/*
	Abstract function. Needs to be implemented in children classes.
	*/
	runJobForRecord: function(current) {
		throw this.type + ': runJobForRecord(current) needs to be implemented';
	},

    type: 'AssetManagementPerRecordBaseJob'
});]]></script>
